message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.NI, cs.CR. 

The paper deals with the problem of allocating storage in a distributed storage system, which involves coding and recovery of data. This problem is related to information theory (cs.IT), distributed systems (cs.DS), and security and privacy (cs.CR). The paper also discusses different allocation models and access models, which are relevant to social and information networks (cs.SI) and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI).
